title: can't use masteries
body: i can't use my masteries in the games. i have deleted and reset the pages, but for some reason i still can't use them. does someone know how to fix this? please and thanks

replies.body: I'm not sure I understand your issue.  Which masteries can't you use?  Adjusting your masteries are only available through the client, and cannot be changed while in-game.  Let me know!
i can't use any of them.

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this individually with you and get a better idea of your issue.  Any additional detail or even screenshots in your ticket can help a lot!  We'll get back to you!
